sentences: Istu sa siia keskele, meie vahele!
context: Keskele is an Estonian postposition and adverb that means 'to the middle', 'into the middle', or 'among'. When used as a postposition (genitive case), it indicates movement to a central point within something or someone, such as going into the middle of a room, river, or group. As an adverb, it describes being in the center position, like sitting in the middle among others.
